newsitem.title: USA: Multimedia Games wins bingo game contract.
newsitem.headline: Multimedia Games wins bingo game contract.

text.p: Multimedia Games Inc said Tuesday it signed a contract with the Upper Skaqit Indian Tribe to install its high-stakes MegaMania bingo game at a casino in Bow, Washington.
Multimedia Games said it has already installed the 24 machines at Harrah's Skaqit Valley casino.
The company also announced a contract to install 24 additional units at the Lucky Eagle gaming facility in Rochester, Washington, owned by the Confederated Tribe of the Chehalis Indians.
Multimedia Games provides electronic bingo games and data processing services to the Indian gaming industry.
